CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c) || ISNULL(vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c) || ISBLANK(vlocity_ins__DueDate__c) || ISNULL(vlocity_ins__DueDate__c) || vlocity_ins__ItemLength__c <= 0, 'Green', IF( TEXT(vlocity_ins__State__c) == 'READY' || TEXT(vlocity_ins__State__c) == 'RUNNING' || TEXT(vlocity_ins__State__c) == 'FAILED' || TEXT(vlocity_ins__State__c) == 'FATALLY FAILED' || TEXT(vlocity_ins__State__c) == 'FROZEN - RUNNING' || TEXT(vlocity_ins__State__c) == 'FROZEN - FAILED' || TEXT(vlocity_ins__State__c) == 'FROZEN - FATALLY FAILED' || TEXT(vlocity_ins__State__c) == 'FROZEN', IF(NOW() >= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c, 'Red',IF(vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyInterval__c <= 0,'Green', CASE(vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyIntervalUnit__c, 'Seconds', IF(NOW() <= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c - (vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyInterval__c/(24*60*60)), 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Calendar Hours', IF(NOW() <= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c - (vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyInterval__c/24), 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Calendar Days', IF(NOW() <= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c - vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyInterval__c, 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Business Hours', IF(NOW() <= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c - (vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyInterval__c/24), 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Business Days', IF(NOW() <= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c - vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyInterval__c, 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Green') ) ), IF(vlocity_ins__DueDate__c >= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c, 'Red', IF( vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyInterval__c <= 0, 'Green', CASE(vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyIntervalUnit__c, 'Seconds', IF(vlocity_ins__DueDate__c <= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c - (vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyInterval__c/(24*60*60)), 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Calendar Hours', IF(vlocity_ins__DueDate__c <= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c - (vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyInterval__c/24), 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Calendar Days', IF(vlocity_ins__DueDate__c <= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c - vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyInterval__c, 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Business Hours', IF(vlocity_ins__DueDate__c <= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c - (vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyInterval__c/24), 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Business Days', IF(vlocity_ins__DueDate__c <= vlocity_ins__ExpectedCompletionDate__c - vlocity_ins__JeopardySafetyInterval__c, 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Green') ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Jeopardy Status
